short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension allowing GraphCMS (both app and legacy) content to be exported to XLIFF for translation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension enhancing your GraphCMS (both app and legacy) experience


Extends both the legacy and new app GraphCMS web application to allow download of XLIFF 2.0 files from their web interface. This is to support the workflow of developers and translators.

Based on the original extension for GraphCMS legacy: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/graphcms-extend/paicljhmdgekbaedkgemhhngckhmojka
